file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-30-08-06 - BAGGAGE DOOR - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE DOOR - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the baggage door for general condition. B. Related Zone: 813. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 22010.2 thru STA X = 23070.2. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 18465.2 thru STA X = 19525.2. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY BAGGAGE DOOR - INTERNAL GENERAL ALL 05-30-08-200-801-A ♦ VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-30-08 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-30-08-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. BAGGAGE DOOR - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 52-Z813-214-001-A00. (2) You must do the internal general visual inspection (GVI) of baggage door, at zone 813, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-51-02-000-801-A/400 BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-51-02-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) Open the baggage door. (3) Remove the baggage door lining ( AMM TASK 25-51-02-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-08 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Internal General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the baggage door actuating and locking mechanism (Figure 601). (2) Examine the upper and lower bellcrank springs (Figure 601). (3) Examine the cables for condition (Figure 602). (4) Examine the bellcrank rollers (Figure 602). (5) Examine the presence of any foreign objects. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the baggage door lining ( AMM TASK 25-51-02-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-08 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
